God would have those who guard these institutions appreciate those whom he has chosen, and esteem them highly for their work's sake. Sharp, close dealing in business is entirely out of place between them and the father of these institutions, whose earnest working and self-denying efforts have, through the blessing of God, made them what they 
                                                                           25
are. Such a course would be regarded by the servant of God as injustice, and would result in awakening in him the same spirit.
